name: Cosmic Survivor (Kit Sumo)
description:
Horde like gameplay where the enemy becomes more challenging over time. Collect power-ups to stay ahead. Target game length is less than 10 minutes, but infinite play possible. 

In active development. Each version will have it's own leaderboard. It's envisioned the final game will have 3-4 unlockable ships, roguelike upgrades, and music.

Inspired by Vampire Survivors. It took it's own path,  limited by my skills, or lack thereof XD

Also available for free on Sidequest for the Meta Quest. It was originally built for the Meta Quest so no fancy lighting.  It's envisioned a paid version will appear on App Labs on final release. Give it a go and leave a comment with any feedback!
